tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, kâinatın vicdanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ömer Hayyam

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih değil, hatalar tekerrür eder.
tr_quotes.author: II. Abdülhamid

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihten de eski bir müzayede salonu sanki yüreğim: paha biçilemiyor sana aldanışlarıma.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya hakkında hükmü, tarih verir.
tr_quotes.author: Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyanın tarihi dünyanın yargısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Yenilenlerin tarihini, yenenler yapmıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Berthold Brecht

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya tarihi, özgürlüğün bilincinde ilerlemelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Hegel

tr_quotes.quote: Aydınlatıcı çalışmaların en iyisi, tarihtir.
tr_quotes.author: Sallust

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, muazzam bir erken uyarma sistemidir.
tr_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, geçmişi yargılamaktan başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Alain

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih; cinayetlerin ve felâketlerin bir tutanağıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişin yıkıntıları, bugünün uyarılarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: George Bancroft

tr_quotes.quote: Çekiç olmak istemeyen, tarihin örsü olacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihi öğrenmeyenler, onu tekrar yaşamak zorunda kalırlar.
tr_quotes.author: George Santayana

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihten hiçbir şey öğrenilemeyeceğini, tarihten öğreniriz.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihten edindiğimiz en iyi şey, onun uyandırdığı coşkudur.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlık tarihi, giderek eğitimle felaket arasında, bir yarışa dönüşmektedir.
tr_quotes.author: H. G. Wells

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih ile efsanenin amacı birdir: Geçici insanda ebedî insanı anlatmak.
tr_quotes.author: V. Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük ve tarihi olayları, ancak büyük uluslar yaşayabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan, tarihe her istediğini söyletebilir; çünkü ölüler itiraz edemezler.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Şehabeddin

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes tarih yapabilir ancak sadece büyük bir adam tarih yazabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, milletlerin tarlasıdır. Her toplum, geçmişte ne ekmişse, gelecekte onu biçer.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük adamlar tarihi, tarih de büyük adamların yaptıklarını süslemiştir.
tr_quotes.author: La Bruyere

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih; okuyana kendi gözünün görme derecesine göre yol gösteren bir kılavuzdur.
tr_quotes.author: J. J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, bir bilimdir. Orada da ruh ve düşünce, tenkit ve yöntemler vardır.
tr_quotes.author: F. Calloge

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih yazmak, tarih yapmak kadar önemlidir. Yazan, yapana sadık kalmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihi yapan akıl, mantık, muhakeme değil; belki bunlardan ziyade hissiyattır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihin başlıca faydası; öncekilerin iyi ve kötü işlerini bize öğretmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: L. Chesterfield

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih; milletlerin tarlasıdır. Her toplum geçmişte bu tarlaya ne ekmişse, gelecekte onu biçer.
tr_quotes.author: M. Cevdet Anday

tr_quotes.quote: Gelecekte bizi nelerin beklediğinin en iyi falcısı, geçmişte başımıza gelenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: John Sheran

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, başka başka insanlara ve zamanlara rastlayan vak’aların tekrarlamasından başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Chateaubriand

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih bir kâğıt parçası üzerine basılmış harflerden ibarettir, önemli olan tarih yapmaktır, yazmak değil.
tr_quotes.author: O. V. Bismarck

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih şuuru sadece geçmişin geçmişliğini bilmek değil onun halde de var olduğunu anlamak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas S. Eliot

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, insanların düşlerinin en aydınlık olanlarını gerçekleştirmek için giriştikleri, umutsuz bir çabadan başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihte her hareket, hep bir kişinin ayağa kalkmasıyla başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aydınlatıcı çalışmaların en iyisi, tarihtir.
tr_quotes.author: Sallust

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih kâinâtın vicdanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, başka başka insanlara ve zamanlara rastlayan vak’aların tekrarlamasından başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Chateaubriand

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihi insanlar değil, Allah yazar. İnsanlar sözleriyle, tavırlarıyla nerede durduklarını gösterirler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihi yazmak, tarihi yapmak kadar önemlidir. Yazan yapana bağlı kalmazsa değişmeyen gerçek. İnsanlığı şaşırtacak bir nitelik alır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihten hiçbir şey öğrenilemeyeceğini, tarihten öğreniriz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih; milletlerin tarlasıdır. Her toplum geçmişte bu tarlaya ne ekmişse, gelecekte onu biçer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan, tarihe her istediğini söyletebilir; çünkü ölüler itiraz edemezler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih; okuyana kendi gözünün görme derecesine göre yol gösteren bir kılavuzdur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, yinelemeyen şeylerin bilimidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Evvela millete tarihini, asil bir millete mensup bulunduğunu, bütün medeniyetlerin anası olan ileri bir milletin çocukları olduğunu öğretmeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih yazmak, tarih yapmak kadar mühimdir.Yazan yapana sadık kalmazsa değişmeyen hakikat, insanlığı şaşırtacak bir hal alır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih her zaman sadece başarılılyı över.
tr_quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

tr_quotes.quote: Tarihi tekerrür diye tarif ediyorlar, hiç ibret alınsaydı, tekerrür eder miydi?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tarih, başka başka insanlara ve zamanlara rastlayan vak'aların tekrarlamasından başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: You don't change the course of history by turning the faces of portraits to the wall
en_quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

en_quotes.quote: What is history? An echo of the past in the future; a reflex from the future on the past
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: The kitchen is the heart of every home, for the most part. It evokes memories of your family history
en_quotes.author: Debi Mazar

en_quotes.quote: History will decide if I'm a villain or a hero
en_quotes.author: Harlan Ellison

en_quotes.quote: A small body of determined spirits fired by an unquenchable faith in their mission can alter the course of history
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: The problem is that my generation was pacified into believing that racism existed only in our history books
en_quotes.author: Chance The Rapper

en_quotes.quote: History is dependent on the new generation to write a new chapter
en_quotes.author: LaMelo Ball

en_quotes.quote: History never really says goodbye. History says, 'See you later.'
en_quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

en_quotes.quote: The American flag is the symbol of our freedom, national pride and history
en_quotes.author: Mike Fitzpatrick

en_quotes.quote: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: Condemn me. It does not matter. History will absolve me
en_quotes.author: Fidel Castro

en_quotes.quote: History is a set of lies agreed upon
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: History repeats itself. So you might wanna pay attention
en_quotes.author: Quavo

en_quotes.quote: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: Auschwitz will forever remain the black hole of the entire human history
en_quotes.author: Isaac Herzog

en_quotes.quote: I love history... everything is inspired by history, so that's why I love vintage and antiques
en_quotes.author: Kelly Wearstler

en_quotes.quote: History is a people's memory, and without a memory, man is demoted to the lower animals
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: History is a vast early warning system
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: The more you know of your history, the more liberated you are
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: The history of the world is none other than the progress of the consciousness of freedom
en_quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

en_quotes.quote: History is a guide to navigation in perilous times. History is who we are and why we are the way we are
en_quotes.author: David McCullough

en_quotes.quote: People are trapped in history and history is trapped in them
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: My favourite finds are often antique pieces with a history
en_quotes.author: Alice Temperley

en_quotes.quote: I came, I saw, I conquered
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: You learn about equality in history and civics, but you find out life is not really like that
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: That men do not learn very much from the lessons of history is the most important of all the lessons of history
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: It is impossible to predict the time and progress of revolution. It is governed by its own more or less mysterious laws
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

en_quotes.quote: In the course of American history, great steps are taken by ordinary people, and ordinary people are not perfect
en_quotes.author: Tommy Lee Jones

en_quotes.quote: I'm obsessed by the idea of making my mark on history. And Arsenal is my paradise
en_quotes.author: Thierry Henry

en_quotes.quote: I don't believe in accidents. There are only encounters in history. There are no accidents
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: It is remarkable how closely the history of the apple tree is connected with that of man
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: The people who have really made history are the martyrs
en_quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

en_quotes.quote: History repeats itself. Historians repeat each other
en_quotes.author: Philip Guedalla

en_quotes.quote: There has never yet been a man in our history who led a life of ease whose name is worth remembering
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Despite its challenges, globalization has led to one of the most peaceful and productive times in world history
en_quotes.author: Mike Quigley

en_quotes.quote: My lifestyle is a consequence of my wounds. I'm the son of my history
en_quotes.author: Jose Mujica

en_quotes.quote: History is a gallery of pictures in which there are few originals and many copies
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: The main thing is to make history, not to write it
en_quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

en_quotes.quote: Manchester United are not just some club. To be part of this club also means to be part of a great history
en_quotes.author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan

en_quotes.quote: Women love hairy men. Cavemen were the sexiest men in history
en_quotes.author: Leslie Mann

en_quotes.quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: The very ink with which history is written is merely fluid prejudice
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing new in the world except the history you do not know
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: We are not makers of history. We are made by history
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Elimination of illiteracy is as serious an issue to our history as the abolition of slavery
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: God will use whatever he wants to display his glory. Heavens and stars. History and nations. People and problems
en_quotes.author: Max Lucado

en_quotes.quote: History is, strictly speaking, the study of questions; the study of answers belongs to anthropology and sociology
en_quotes.author: W. H. Auden

en_quotes.quote: Among famous traitors of history one might mention the weather
en_quotes.author: Ilka Chase

en_quotes.quote: A study of the history of opinion is a necessary preliminary to the emancipation of the mind
en_quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

en_quotes.quote: A world without nuclear weapons would be less stable and more dangerous for all of us
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Who has fully realized that history is not contained in thick books but lives in our very blood?
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: The Fort Lauderdale Strikers is a team with history, tradition
en_quotes.author: Ronaldo

en_quotes.quote: Tradition means taking account of a wonderful history but remembering that everybody today looks to the future
en_quotes.author: Michael Kadoorie

en_quotes.quote: History is Philosophy teaching by example
en_quotes.author: Thucydides

en_quotes.quote: There are no extraordinary men... just extraordinary circumstances that ordinary men are forced to deal with
en_quotes.author: William Halsey

en_quotes.quote: Beating Pakistan is always special because they are a tough team and we have a bit of a history regarding Pakistan
en_quotes.author: Sachin Tendulkar

en_quotes.quote: I'm focused on being the best, making history
en_quotes.author: Canelo Alvarez

en_quotes.quote: Human history becomes more and more a race between education and catastrophe
en_quotes.author: H. G. Wells

en_quotes.quote: Never, ever forget history
en_quotes.author: Sukarno

en_quotes.quote: A Conservative is a fellow who is standing athwart history yelling 'Stop!'
en_quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Civilization is a movement and not a condition, a voyage and not a harbor
en_quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

en_quotes.quote: This is an exciting time. A new chapter in our history
en_quotes.author: John Barth

en_quotes.quote: We cannot leave history entirely to nonclinical observers and to professional historians
en_quotes.author: Erik Erikson

en_quotes.quote: Study history, study history. In history lies all the secrets of statecraft
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: We are still living in the aftershock of Hiroshima, people are still the scars of history
en_quotes.author: Edward Bond

en_quotes.quote: There are great legends and great fighters in the history of Mexico, and there will be more to come
en_quotes.author: Canelo Alvarez

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes history repeats itself. And sometimes it doesn't
en_quotes.author: Adam Curtis

en_quotes.quote: History repeats itself, and that's one of the things that's wrong with history
en_quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

en_quotes.quote: I long for the time when all human history is taught as one history, because it really is
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: The people of Egypt are an intelligent people with a glorious history who left their mark on civilization
en_quotes.author: Fidel Castro

en_quotes.quote: Revolutions are the locomotives of history
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes - history needs a push
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

en_quotes.quote: Violent men have not been known in history to die to a man. They die up to a point
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: History, in general, only informs us of what bad government is
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: I feel like I'm too busy writing history to read it
en_quotes.author: Kanye West

en_quotes.quote: I promised her an interesting life and good food, and the rest is history
en_quotes.author: Bob Ehrlich

en_quotes.quote: History is more or less bunk
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: The public history of modern art is the story of conventional people not knowing what they are dealing with
en_quotes.author: Golda Meir

en_quotes.quote: Understanding the long, sordid history of gun control in America is key to understanding the dangers of disarming
en_quotes.author: Niger Innis

en_quotes.quote: Indeed, history is nothing more than a tableau of crimes and misfortunes
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Hegel was right when he said that we learn from history that man can never learn anything from history
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!
en_quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

en_quotes.quote: The history of all previous societies has been the history of class struggles
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: All the gossip and craziness becomes a kind of sustained narrative which, in turn, can become history. It's scary
en_quotes.author: Barbara Kruger

en_quotes.quote: To me, meeting Buddy Guy was like meeting a piece of history
en_quotes.author: Angus Young

en_quotes.quote: The artist's job is to be a witness to his time in history
en_quotes.author: Robert Rauschenberg

en_quotes.quote: Empires inevitably fall, and when they do, history judges them for the legacies they leave behind
en_quotes.author: Noah Feldman

en_quotes.quote: I think bald guys have been notoriously cast as villains throughout history
en_quotes.author: Anthony Carrigan

en_quotes.quote: Men do not learn much from the lessons of history and that is the most important of all the lessons of history
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: A drop of water, if it could write out its own history, would explain the universe to us
en_quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

en_quotes.quote: I am responsible only to God and history
en_quotes.author: Francisco Franco

en_quotes.quote: The view of Jerusalem is the history of the world; it is more, it is the history of earth and of heaven
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Life moves fast. As much as you can learn from your history, you have to move forward
en_quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

en_quotes.quote: I think really, China, Chinese, I think they really have a long history of civilization, rich culture
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: If history could teach us anything, it would be that private property is inextricably linked with civilization
en_quotes.author: Ludwig von Mises

en_quotes.quote: I like to be the winner; I like to change. I like to make history
en_quotes.author: Samir Nasri

en_quotes.quote: Read no history: nothing but biography, for that is life without theory
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: I had not expected 'A Brief History of Time' to be a best seller
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: If history were taught in the form of stories, it would never be forgotten
en_quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

en_quotes.quote: Be as a tower firmly set; Shakes not its top for any blast that blows
en_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

en_quotes.quote: The history of astronomy is a history of receding horizons
en_quotes.author: Edwin Powell Hubble

en_quotes.quote: The history of the past is but one long struggle upward to equality
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

en_quotes.quote: All of us have a place in history. Mine is clouds
en_quotes.author: Richard Brautigan

en_quotes.quote: You can't supervise your own history
en_quotes.author: Roger Taylor

en_quotes.quote: World history is shaped both positively and negatively by people who judge
en_quotes.author: Gad Saad

en_quotes.quote: History is the sum total of things that could have been avoided
en_quotes.author: Konrad Adenauer

en_quotes.quote: History is the great dust-heap... a pageant and not a philosophy
en_quotes.author: Augustine Birrell

en_quotes.quote: History shows that there are no invincible armies
en_quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

en_quotes.quote: If you will read again what is written, you will see how it was
en_quotes.author: Black Elk

en_quotes.quote: History is weirdly dismissed as not having anything to do with the present moment
en_quotes.author: Gaby Hoffmann

en_quotes.quote: The past is malleable and flexible, changing as our recollection interprets and re-explains what has happened
en_quotes.author: Peter L. Berger

en_quotes.quote: The game of history is usually played by the best and the worst over the heads of the majority in the middle
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: On the day when man told the story of his life to man, history was born
en_quotes.author: Alfred de Vigny

en_quotes.quote: It is the soothing thing about history that it does repeat itself
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: History is written by the victors
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Americans love to fight. All real Americans love the sting of battle
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: There are more sure marks of authenticity in the Bible that in any profane history
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: The idea that women were oppressed throughout history is an appalling theory
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: In the course of history, men come to see that iron necessity is neither iron nor necessary
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Legend remains victorious in spite of history
en_quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

en_quotes.quote: History is not hatred
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: History in its broadest aspect is a record of man's migrations from one environment to another
en_quotes.author: Ellsworth Huntington

en_quotes.quote: History teaches that war begins when governments believe the price of aggression is cheap
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: History is the version of past events that people have decided to agree upon
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: All history has been a history of class struggles between dominated classes at various stages of social development
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Engels

en_quotes.quote: Garbage is the part of your history you don't want your family to know about
en_quotes.author: Vik Muniz

en_quotes.quote: Long before history began we men have got together apart from the women and done things. We had time
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: The most terrible job in warfare is to be a second lieutenant leading a platoon when you are on the battlefield
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: I don't want a Black History Month. Black history is American history
en_quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

en_quotes.quote: History is only the register of crimes and misfortunes
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: By looking into more details of American history, we can make more sense of what's happening today
en_quotes.author: Christoph Waltz

en_quotes.quote: The invention of the printing press was one of the most important events in human history
en_quotes.author: Ha-Joon Chang

en_quotes.quote: Journalism allows its readers to witness history; fiction gives its readers an opportunity to live it
en_quotes.author: John Hersey

en_quotes.quote: There are still many causes worth sacrificing for, so much history yet to be made
en_quotes.author: Michelle Obama

en_quotes.quote: Judging from the main portions of the history of the world, so far, justice is always in jeopardy
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: Following the light of the sun, we left the Old World
en_quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

en_quotes.quote: History reminds us that dictators and despots arise during times of severe economic crisis
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: History is not just written by the winners; it's written about them
en_quotes.author: Steve Rushin

en_quotes.quote: My true love is history, but I didn't know how I could make a living at it
en_quotes.author: Robert Zoellick

en_quotes.quote: When history is erased, people's moral values are also erased
en_quotes.author: Ma Jian

en_quotes.quote: Mexico and the U.S. are bound not only because of the common border, but by a shared culture and history
en_quotes.author: Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador

en_quotes.quote: It's a very good historical book about history
en_quotes.author: Dan Quayle

en_quotes.quote: History proves that the white man is a devil
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: Mankind has probably done more damage to the Earth in the 20th century than in all of previous human history
en_quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

en_quotes.quote: The writer may very well serve a movement of history as its mouthpiece, but he cannot of course create it
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: History is a cyclic poem written by time upon the memories of man
en_quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

en_quotes.quote: What is history but a fable agreed upon?
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: For the very first time the young are seeing history being made before it is censored by their elders
en_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

en_quotes.quote: There's always some kind of blacklist throughout history. But the difference is, in America they usually let you live
en_quotes.author: Rip Torn

en_quotes.quote: Young people, throughout history, have always been the lifeblood of every movement for civil and human rights
en_quotes.author: Shaun King

en_quotes.quote: We learned the value of research in World War II
en_quotes.author: Amar Bose

en_quotes.quote: History has always judged silence and complicity harshly in these times of moral consequence
en_quotes.author: Pramila Jayapal

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to give myself grades. I will leave evaluation of my achievements to history
en_quotes.author: Helmut Kohl

en_quotes.quote: We would like to live as we once lived, but history will not permit it
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: History should be written as philosophy
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Things have never been more like the way they are today in history
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: World history is a court of judgment
en_quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes history takes things into its own hands
en_quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

en_quotes.quote: Skepticism is a virtue in history as well as in philosophy
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: In Thailand's history there have been dissensions from time to time, but in general, unity has prevailed
en_quotes.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

en_quotes.quote: My place in history will depend on what I can do for the people and not on what the people can do for me
en_quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

en_quotes.quote: You don't want to trash what you've done; that's your history
en_quotes.author: Pat Benatar

en_quotes.quote: History can just be so unkind as time passes
en_quotes.author: Joshua Henry

en_quotes.quote: Junk stands and antique markets are the perfect place to pick up clues about the history of a country, region or town
en_quotes.author: Judith Miller

en_quotes.quote: People who want to know who I am, or my history, put my name into Google
en_quotes.author: Dani Alves

en_quotes.quote: History is a pack of lies about events that never happened told by people who weren't there
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: The fastest manned vehicle in history was Apollo 10. It reached 25,000 mph
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: History is mostly guessing; the rest is prejudice
en_quotes.author: Will Durant

en_quotes.quote: Governments have never learned anything from history, or acted on principles deducted from it
en_quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

en_quotes.quote: Historian: an unsuccessful novelist
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: We cannot defend freedom abroad by deserting it at home
en_quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

en_quotes.quote: I loved history because to me, history was like watching a movie
en_quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

en_quotes.quote: If past history was all there was to the game, the richest people would be librarians
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: Strip malls are history
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: Most of the things worth doing in the world had been declared impossible before they were done
en_quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

en_quotes.quote: Love is the whole history of a woman's life, it is but an episode in a man's
en_quotes.author: Madame de Stael

en_quotes.quote: History should not be left to the historians. Rather, be like Churchill. Make history, and then write it
en_quotes.author: Ferdinand Marcos

en_quotes.quote: I'm a closet nerd. I love to study history and visit museums
en_quotes.author: Shakira

en_quotes.quote: In its history, Europe has committed so many massacres and horrors that it should bow its own head in shame
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: I'm playing dark history. It's beyond black. I'm dealing with the dark things of the cosmos
en_quotes.author: Sun Ra

en_quotes.quote: Natural selection, as it has operated in human history, favors not only the clever but the murderous
en_quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

en_quotes.quote: I think if you come from a history of persecution you have to develop a sense of humour
en_quotes.author: Sacha Baron Cohen

en_quotes.quote: I did a history degree once
en_quotes.author: Joe Thomas

en_quotes.quote: If you look at my professional history as a goalkeeper, I'm not somebody who makes many
en_quotes.author: Alisson

en_quotes.quote: People that are really very weird can get into sensitive positions and have a tremendous impact on history
en_quotes.author: Dan Quayle

en_quotes.quote: Antiquities are history defaced, or some remnants of history which have casually escaped the shipwreck of time
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: The greatest honor history can bestow is that of peacemaker
en_quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

en_quotes.quote: I can see clearly now... that I was wrong in not acting more decisively and more forthrightly in dealing with Watergate
en_quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

en_quotes.quote: The Russians feared Ike. They didn't fear me
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Difficulty is the excuse history never accepts
en_quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

en_quotes.quote: History is the only true teacher, the revolution the best school for the proletariat
en_quotes.author: Rosa Luxemburg

en_quotes.quote: History opens up new worlds to film-makers all the time
en_quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

en_quotes.quote: If you look at it, the history of comedy has always been strongest among the nations who have been persecuted the most
en_quotes.author: Trevor Noah

en_quotes.quote: 90 percent of my time is spent on 10 percent of the world
en_quotes.author: Colin Powell

en_quotes.quote: I don't think we handled the aftermath of the fall of Baghdad as well as we might have. But that's now history
en_quotes.author: Colin Powell

en_quotes.quote: You either make history or you don't
en_quotes.author: Ozuna

en_quotes.quote: In history, psychedelic plants were used by priests and shamans with a desire to discover the interior
en_quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

en_quotes.quote: I spend much more time looking at art history and at different references to art than I do at actual objects
en_quotes.author: Jeff Koons

en_quotes.quote: American history contains much matter for pride and congratulation, and much matter for regret and humiliation
en_quotes.author: Herbert Croly

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is insignificant in the history of a young community, and - above all - nothing seems impossible
en_quotes.author: Catherine Helen Spence

en_quotes.quote: History is an endless repetition of the wrong way of living
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

en_quotes.quote: I still love the whole history of jazz. The old things sound better than ever
en_quotes.author: Steve Lacy

en_quotes.quote: History has always been a series of pendulum swings, but the individual doesn't have to get caught in that
en_quotes.author: Robert Johnson

en_quotes.quote: The upward course of a nation's history is due in the long run to the soundness of heart of its average men and women
en_quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

en_quotes.quote: The world has entered an era of the most profound and challenging change in human history
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: Well, I think that California has had a history of always spending more money than it takes in
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: De Sade is the one completely consistent and thoroughgoing revolutionary of history
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: The history of saints is mainly the history of insane people
en_quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

en_quotes.quote: I seldom go into a natural history museum without feeling as if I were attending a funeral
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: For most of history, Anonymous was a woman
en_quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

en_quotes.quote: The biggest difference between England and America is that England has history, while America has geography
en_quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

en_quotes.quote: Physics has a history of synthesizing many phenomena into a few theories
en_quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

en_quotes.quote: People who make history know nothing about history. You can see that in the sort of history they make
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: God has never, in the history of mankind, allowed his name to go long offended
en_quotes.author: David Wilkerson

en_quotes.quote: The way you 'take history' is also a way of 'making history.'
en_quotes.author: Erik Erikson

en_quotes.quote: We are not merely passive pawns of historical forces; nor are we victims of the past. We can shape and direct history
en_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

en_quotes.quote: Europe was created by history. America was created by philosophy
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: What Britain needs is an iron lady
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: My work is not about my life history. It's not about the story of my neurosis
en_quotes.author: Anish Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: It is not I who have been consigned to the bedroom of history
en_quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

en_quotes.quote: If you want to study the social and political history of modern nations, study hell
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: A truly American sentiment recognizes the dignity of labor and the fact that honor lies in honest toil
en_quotes.author: Grover Cleveland

en_quotes.quote: Of course, people will be partial, but I put myself among the best in history
en_quotes.author: Jose Aldo

en_quotes.quote: I have always been - I think any student of history almost inevitably is - a cheerful pessimist
en_quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

en_quotes.quote: The past actually happened but history is only what someone wrote down
en_quotes.author: A. Whitney Brown

en_quotes.quote: I can't change history, I don't want to change history. I can only change the future. I'm working on that
en_quotes.author: Boris Becker

en_quotes.quote: Malaria has long been a devastating and life-threatening global epidemic disease in human history
en_quotes.author: Tu Youyou

en_quotes.quote: There aren't just bad people that commit genocide; we are all capable of it. It's our evolutionary history
en_quotes.author: James Lovelock

en_quotes.quote: The 1st Amendment protects the right to speak, not the right to spend
en_quotes.author: Byron White

en_quotes.quote: The judicial system is the most expensive machine ever invented for finding out what happened and what to do about it
en_quotes.author: Irving R. Kaufman

en_quotes.quote: My reading of history convinces me that most bad government has grown out of too much government
en_quotes.author: John Sharp Williams

en_quotes.quote: The 1950s and 1960s had been a period of enormous growth, the highest in American history, maybe in economic history
en_quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

en_quotes.quote: History shows that the majority of people that have done anything great have passed their youth in seclusion
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Women, we might as well be dogs baying the moon as petitioners without the right to vote!
en_quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

en_quotes.quote: There's been a lot of experience with torture in history. It doesn't work
en_quotes.author: Molly Ivins

en_quotes.quote: Now, there are some who would like to rewrite history - revisionist historians is what I like to call them
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: A family shares hardships and a connected history
en_quotes.author: Kamala Harris

en_quotes.quote: I'm the only person of distinction who has ever had a depression named for him
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: History never looks like history when you are living through it
en_quotes.author: John W. Gardner

en_quotes.quote: Old cookbooks connect you to your past and explain the history of the world
en_quotes.author: Jose Andres

en_quotes.quote: Neither current events nor history show that the majority rule, or ever did rule
en_quotes.author: Jefferson Davis

en_quotes.quote: The nation was awakened by that deafening shot
en_quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

en_quotes.quote: The greatest untapped reservoir of raw material in the history of our game is the black race
en_quotes.author: Branch Rickey

en_quotes.quote: Time is my greatest enemy
en_quotes.author: Evita Peron

en_quotes.quote: When the rich think about the poor, they have poor ideas
en_quotes.author: Evita Peron

en_quotes.quote: The history of mankind is the history of ideas
en_quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

en_quotes.quote: The Ku Klux Klan is the most profligate domestic terrorist organization in this country's history
en_quotes.author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

en_quotes.quote: Never doubt that you can change history. You already have
en_quotes.author: Marge Piercy

en_quotes.quote: The fall of the Berlin Wall makes for nice pictures. But it all started in the shipyards
en_quotes.author: Lech Walesa

en_quotes.quote: There is a history which has to be reversed, and that is the demolition of our temples
en_quotes.author: Subramanian Swamy

en_quotes.quote: Today is either the beginning of the end, or the end of the beginning. Today we are making history
en_quotes.author: Eckhard Pfeiffer

en_quotes.quote: Like most of those who study history, he (Napoleon III) learned from the mistakes of the past how to make new ones
en_quotes.author: A. J. P. Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Without knowing your own history, you are doomed to repeat it
en_quotes.author: Emily V. Gordon

en_quotes.quote: The history of nations shows that words are not always immediately followed by action
en_quotes.author: Gustav Stresemann

en_quotes.quote: The Voting Rights Act of 1965 brought an end to the ugly Jim Crow period in American history
en_quotes.author: Lisa Murkowski

en_quotes.quote: Young people have been at the forefront of every great social movement in our country's history
en_quotes.author: Sherrod Brown

en_quotes.quote: I feel like I'm part of history being made. I leave Apple board meetings thinking, 'I've got to do a better job.'
en_quotes.author: Andrea Jung

en_quotes.quote: To people who remember JFK's assassination, JFK Jr. will probably always be that boy saluting his father's coffin
en_quotes.author: Michael Beschloss

en_quotes.quote: Most of the best music in American history was made by people with no options
en_quotes.author: Isaac Brock

en_quotes.quote: The construction of Europe is an art. It is the art of the possible
en_quotes.author: Jacques Chirac

en_quotes.quote: The Iran nuclear issue is on top of the agenda. It is a very complicated issue with long history
en_quotes.author: Yukiya Amano

en_quotes.quote: I let the American people down
en_quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

en_quotes.quote: I was France
en_quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

en_quotes.quote: Passion is universal humanity. Without it religion, history, romance and art would be useless
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: It was a Greek tragedy. Nixon was fulfilling his own nature. Once it started it could not end otherwise
en_quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

en_quotes.quote: This is the lesson that history teaches: repetition
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: Those who invoke history will certainly be heard by history. And they will have to accept its verdict
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: Most of us spend too much time on the last twenty-four hours and too little on the last six thousand years
en_quotes.author: Will Durant

en_quotes.quote: History develops, art stands still
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: I did not come to NASA to make history
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: Chaos often breeds life, when order breeds habit
en_quotes.author: Henry Adams

en_quotes.quote: It takes an endless amount of history to make even a little tradition
en_quotes.author: Henry James

en_quotes.quote: For it is the duty of an astronomer to compose the history of the celestial motions through careful and expert study
en_quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

en_quotes.quote: A war still rages over the legacy of the 1960s
en_quotes.author: Camille Paglia

en_quotes.quote: God cannot alter the past, though historians can
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: History is indeed little more than the register of the crimes, follies, and misfortunes of mankind
en_quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

en_quotes.quote: History is a vision of God's creation on the move
en_quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

en_quotes.quote: World War II was the last government program that really worked
en_quotes.author: George Will

en_quotes.quote: One who comes to the Court must come to adore, not to protest. That's the new gloss on the 1st Amendment
en_quotes.author: William O. Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Tell the FBI that the kidnappers should pick out a judge that Nixon wants back
en_quotes.author: William O. Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Statutes authorizing unreasonable searches were the core concern of the framers of the 4th Amendment
en_quotes.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

en_quotes.quote: Holding an Olympic Games means evoking history
en_quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

en_quotes.quote: Keeping books on social aid is capitalistic nonsense. I just use the money for the poor. I can't stop to count it
en_quotes.author: Evita Peron

en_quotes.quote: The prolonged slavery of women is the darkest page in human history
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

en_quotes.quote: History is not a burden on the memory but an illumination of the soul
en_quotes.author: John Dalberg-Acton

en_quotes.quote: It took us in this country 11 years to get from the Declaration of Independence to the Constitution
en_quotes.author: Mitch McConnell

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps in time the so-called Dark Ages will be thought of as including our own
en_quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

en_quotes.quote: I subscribe to William Faulkner's' view that history is not just about what we were before but who we are now
en_quotes.author: Ken Burns

en_quotes.quote: We awoke one morning in September, and the world lurched on its axis
en_quotes.author: Jeb Bush

en_quotes.quote: You have to look at history as an evolution of society
en_quotes.author: Jean Chretien

en_quotes.quote: Russians can give you arms but only the United States can give you a solution
en_quotes.author: Anwar Sadat

en_quotes.quote: Generally speaking, historically in this country, the care of a child has been thought of as female business
en_quotes.author: Eddie Bernice Johnson

en_quotes.quote: History is a tool used by politicians to justify their intentions
en_quotes.author: Ted Koppel

en_quotes.quote: That great dust-heap called 'history'
en_quotes.author: Augustine Birrell

en_quotes.quote: An Edwardian lady in full dress was a wonder to behold, and her preparations for viewing were awesome
en_quotes.author: William Manchester
